title: Gold Grasshopper
summaries: The Gold Grasshopper is a harmless critter. It is a golden recolor of the ordinary Grasshopper, with a 0.25*1/400 (0.25%) chance of spawning in place of the ordinary version.
The Gold Grasshopper has only 5 <linked>health</linked> and no <linked>defense</linked>, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Gold Grasshopper can be caught with any Bug Net to be carried around in the inventory and released later, or crafted into animated decorative furniture (Gold Grasshopper Cage). Once crafted, the Gold Grasshopper cannot be released again. the Gold Grasshopper itself or the crafted furniture can be sold for 10 GC.
The Gold Grasshopper can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 50% bait power.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
